articles.title: Ladakh proposed for India's first Mars and Moon analogue research station - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The research comes as India steps up its space programme, which includes plans for a space station by 2035 and a landing on the moon by 2040.

articles.title: Oropouche virus: Brazil records first deaths caused by virus that has no vaccine - India Today - India Today
articles.description: The Oropouche virus has recorded its first deaths in Brazil's Bahai. The mystery virus, upon which very little research has been done has no vaccine available. Those infected face mild symptoms, but in certain cases the virus is fatal. Watch the video to know…
